ArticleTitle.sentence: Expression of c-jun, jun B and jun D proto-oncogenes in human peripheral-blood granulocytes.

event.clue: Expression of c-jun, jun B and jun D proto-oncogenes in human peripheral-blood granulocytes.
Expression of c-jun, jun B and jun D proto-oncogenes in human peripheral-blood granulocytes.

AbstractText.sentence: We have found that purified human peripheral-blood granulocytes express constitutively significant levels of proto-oncogenes c-jun, jun B and jun D mRNA.

event.clue: We have found that purified human peripheral-blood granulocytes express constitutively significant levels of proto-oncogenes c-jun, jun B and jun D mRNA.
We have found that purified human peripheral-blood granulocytes express constitutively significant levels of proto-oncogenes c-jun, jun B and jun D mRNA.
We have found that purified human peripheral-blood granulocytes express constitutively significant levels of proto-oncogenes c-jun, jun B and jun D mRNA.

AbstractText.sentence: Upon functional activation of granulocytes by 4 beta-phorbol 12-myristate 13-acetate (PMA), the levels of c-jun, jun B and jun D transcripts were increased.

event.clue: Upon functional activation of granulocytes by 4 beta-phorbol 12-myristate 13-acetate (PMA), the levels of c-jun, jun B and jun D transcripts were increased.

AbstractText.sentence: The three jun genes showed a similar time course in their induction by PMA, maximal mRNA levels being reached after 60 min of induction.

AbstractText.sentence: These results suggest that expression of c-jun, jun B and jun D genes might be involved in terminal granulocyte differentiation or in regulating granulocyte functionality.
